title: Ceremonial Swearing-In
content: Embargoed for release  2:30 p.m. EST  February 3, 2010     Remarks   By   Ben S. Bernanke   Chairman   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   at the   Ceremonial Swearing-In    Atrium   Federal Reserve Board   Washington, D.C.    February 3, 2010
